1.0.name: wordpress/google-one-button
1.0.description:
This plugins enables the famous Google +1-button in your wordpress-installation. The button is shown beneath your posts/pages. With this button you can share the permalink to your post/page in your Google+ profile.

You've got the possibility to change the look of the button in the same manner, that you can do by using the configurator that Google provides: see Google plus one.
